entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
